column5: Great report and awesome season Pete congrats and thanks for sharing it with us
awesome report pete!!! cant wait to see what 2015 brings us.
Holy $hit............. Nice muskies dude . well done

Winter is simply far too long... although I like ice and spring fishing, chasing big muskies is my bread and butter. There's just something about these toothy beasts that drives me. As many of you know, I've been trying hard to get that 50" fish for over ten years now, and 2014 was finally the year that it happened. Twice. The first being an absolutely perfect LOTW specimen, flawless and girthy from tip to tail. I couldn't ask for a nicer fish as my first fifty. The second was an even longer specimen from the St. Lawrence... throw in a few very nice Kawartha fish including a personal best tiger muskie and this was my best season bar none. I didn't come close to the 109 muskies I landed in 2010, but quality certainly made up for it. Enough chatter, here's the pictures.  Kawarthas  44"      44" Tiger      45"    45"      46"        48"      Lake of the Woods  48.5"          51"              St. Lawrence River  53.5"              Anyone else wish it was June?  Pete
I sure am looking forward to the June opener.  Congrats on the 50's.    I'm still waiting for my first.  Always seem to come up one inch short.
dam it, I want one even more now, seeing this after buying that reel you suggested doesn't help my itch,  Great report pete
That's a heck of a season.  REALLY nice fish, Pete.
Wow!!!
yer killin meeeee. and I build baits every day. . thanks fer a good look on a snowy day
Keep at it! Great pictures Pete nice job. I got to get out for those things one day, must be incredible when you finally hook-up with one.  Thanks for sharing.  MTBF
wait did you say 109 in one season  :worthy:  :worthy:

After viewing that Pete... I do wish it was June.  Actually mid September by the time muskies get going for me.  Anyways, total freakin' incredible year for ya dood!  Those LOTW pics my fave but that Larry tank a goodun too.  Rate you're going, 2015 you'll be blowing holes in every muskie nuts shorts when you post your fishes here.
Wow !!! Great year you had Pete !!! Some real nice skis for sure !!!!
Great report Pete. You blew through the 50 mark in style. I cant wait for June as well, I think this year is the year I start to figure out some river fish.
Holy jeebus! Them's some awesome fish. I need to figure out how to catch those evasive beasts.
Nice year for sure...  Glad to be part if it  Hopefully I'll get to fish with you again next year...
Very nice.
Geez those are some awesome fish.  I'm not waiting for June yet, still have some cold water species to hit, but I love seeing a report like that.
Have to agree Pete,awesome year you had    .Thanks for the report!!!
Great year there Pete , like the pictures with the young lad . Smiles on both your faces says it all
Like the pics with the kid best!
I wish it was at least May by now! Excellent season Pete!
Pete great season you are officially the Musky Whisperer - look forward to you netting a giant for me this year.
Have my trips booked from June opener through to October- can't wait!
Wow great year for you Pete.  Congrats on the 50's.  Beauty fish bud
Thanks everyone - looking forward to making 2015 an even better season!  Mike - looking forward to more time on the Larry this summer!  Pete
Thanks for the look back. You sure had some fantastic musky fishing in 2014.
Definitely need to fish with you next season!   Unbelievable year you had!!!
